articles.summary: The dollar's early dominance of stablecoins gives the U.S. an advantage that could push up borrowing costs for Europe and reduce the ECB's autonomy, according to ECB blog post. Stablecoins are crypto assets pegged to a currency such as the dollar.

articles.title: PancakeSwap (CAKE) Price Shoots 15%, Thanks to BNB All-Time Highs
articles.author: Coinspeaker
articles.summary: PancakeSwap CAKE's price has surged more than 15% today, shooting past $3.21. BNB Chain-based BNB $836.8's market cap has risen to $116.62 billion in the last 24 hours.

articles.title: Cardano (ADA) Is Still Stuck Under $1, Traders Say This New Crypto Could Outperform It Easily
articles.author: Cyprus Mail
articles.summary: As the crypto market slowly recovers, investors are revisiting familiar names like Cardano (ADA). ADA once captured the spotlight during previous bull runs, but it has yet to reclaim its former glory. ADA is known for its academic foundation and long-term goals.

articles.title: Exciting Binance HODLer Airdrop: Treehouse (TREE) Listing Unveiled!
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Binance has selected Treehouse as the 29th project for their HODLer Airdrop program. Treehouse is the latest project to be selected by the world's largest crypto exchange, Binance. Binance is the most popular exchange in the world.

articles.title: Japan's Metaplanet hits $2B in Bitcoin holdings after latest transfer
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Metaplanet's latest purchase of 780 BTC pushed its BTC holdings above $2 billion. It's latest 780 BTC purchase pushed the company's total BTC holdings to $2.3 billion. The purchase is worth $1.5 billion in total.

articles.title: Consensys Taps DeFi Giant Aave for Metamask Stablecoin Yield
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: Consensys has integrated Aave's lending protocol into Metamask. It allows users to earn yield on stablecoins directly within the wallet. It is available on the Apples app and on Metamasks wallet.   Â   Ã
